message.body: Gesine says: She said "he'd better not be dating someone" and that she would not want to know if he was, as it would just make her upset. If you think she will def find out anyways and prob in a bad way then mb still think about telling her, but otherwise I think it's best to let it be... What are your thoughts?

Ag, maybe it would be better to not say anything then. I'm also having trouble rhinking of how to present it in a not dramatic\upsetting. way. i want to think about it a little though. what do you think?
I told her I agreed we should respect her wishes but I would talk to you. And I agree it does now just seem like drama
I mean, yeah, actually if she said she wouldn't want to know, then we definitely shouldn't.
